properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNO, A.* FROM ( SELECT Q_NO , MEM_NO , Q_WRITER , SECRET , Q_TITLE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , Q_CATEGORY_CODE , A_CONTENT FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
